name: download-server-app
description: This is a miniapp for a download server which allows you to upload files into a server, manage them and ...

scripts.build: rimraf build && tsc && npm run copy-assets
scripts.migrations: npm run build && sequelize db:migrate --config build/db/cli-config.js --migrations-path build/db/migrations
scripts.migrations:undo: npm run build && sequelize db:migrate:undo --config build/db/cli-config.js --migrations-path build/db/migrations
scripts.migrations:undo:all: npm run build && sequelize db:migrate:undo:all --config build/db/cli-config.js --migrations-path build/db/migrations
scripts.seed: npm run build && sequelize db:seed:all --config build/db/cli-config.js --seeders-path build/db/seeders
scripts.seed:undo: npm run build && sequelize db:seed:undo --config build/db/cli-config.js --seeders-path build/db/seeders
